author: Andrew Buncombe, Andrew Buncombe
title: Coronavirus: People dying because of Trump's failure in public health, says Chelsea Clinton
description: President says deaths in US could hit 100,000 – 240,000
content:
Former first daughter Chelsea Clinton has claimed people are dying amid the coronavirus crisis because of Donald Trumps failure in public health, leadership and humanity.
As the president warned Americans to brace themselves for a rough two-week period as ne… [+1552 chars]
